data.title: Locations
data.meta_description: With more than 120,000 employees in more than 50 countries, Koch companies create life's basic necessities for people in the U.S. and around the world.
data.text:
Koch employs more than 120,000 people worldwide, about 60,000 of those in the United States. Our businesses have a presence in about 60 countries across the globe.

Get updates from Koch delivered right to your inbox.

Food. Shelter. Clothing. Transportation. Koch Industries creates lifeâ€™s basic necessities, while innovating ways to make them even better. Yet our advocacy for a free and open society is what truly sets us apart.
